lenders.name: Connor and Jody
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva is an excellent way to be charitable and share our resources with those in need.  We've been very blessed and feel a deep and abiding responsibility to help others who are in need.  

We are members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, and part of our faith is an underlying commitment to "succor those that stand in need of your succor; ...administer of your substance unto him that standeth in need; and... not suffer that the beggar putteth up his petition to you in vain, and turn him out to perish".

We'd like to thank Kiva for providing this excellent service which allows us to help others, be involved in the process, and watch the development and progress of those we are privileged to serve.

lenders.occupational_info: I write computer manuals for people who manage large numbers of computers.

lenders.name: Suchana
lenders.loan_because: It is a gift that keeps on giving.

lenders.name: Ernie
lenders.loan_because: The children in Africa are starving. I invest in female enterprises. Mothers know best.
lenders.occupational_info: I give what I can, because I want to, and can.

lenders.name: E Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want to do what I can to make the world a better place for everyone, and I'm inspired and excited to know that an amount I can actually afford to give can make a real difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: as an artist, I make photos and videos that I hope demonstrate how all things are connected and emphasize how special every aspect of life can be.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in capitalism and believe lending/giving capitol to people to start small business is a good way to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Until my mid- forties I worked with my husband in a small agricultural business gathering fruit tree pollen for cross-pollination. We shipped the pollen all over the world.  In my forties when I was no longer able to work so hard physically I went back to school and became an elementary school counselor.  That is a job where I helped children and their parents who had personal, family or other difficulties be more successful in school.  However, our  money for charitable causes came from the small business.

lenders.name: nathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring life saving drugs to patients at as low of a cost as possible

lenders.name: Johnson&Cathy Ode
lenders.loan_because:
On behalf of my church-The Emmaus Community,Chicago Heights, Illinois.
www.theemmauscommunity.org
lenders.occupational_info:
Be a good Samaritan
Touch somebody life in a day
Sow a seed in somebody life and go out to be who God is calling you to be.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to give back. I am a single Mom of two and I don't have a whole lot, but through sacrifice, I am able to help others.

lenders.name: Susan L.
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because:
It feels great to know that I can help people to help themselves. My small loan can make a big difference for these people!
It is the gift that keeps giving!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people with their health and wellness. Educating people.

lenders.name: DEZ

I CAN,
THEREFORE I AM.

lenders.occupational_info: I help realize business and social ideas by building websites & online communities.  I try to work on or promote businesses that are fun, entrepreneurial, innovative, sustainable and interesting.

lenders.occupational_info: I managed several large retail pharmacy accounts with  services such as pharmacy and promotional programs,  to assist them in their day to day business

lenders.name: Warren

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.occupational_info: I help find new ways to share information about cool and useful Mac (computer) software. I love helping and getting help from anybody who's taking responsibility for their own income. It's inspiring!

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.loan_because: We like to loan because everybody  must have a opportunity to have a good life. To help other to do what he or she likes to do make us feel very good.
lenders.occupational_info: Me and my wife are both working. Elleke is working at the local council and im working as a truckdriver.

lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and wish the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company, making sure they follow the rules and treat people fairly.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: To invest in people's potential is the most effective way to build a better world.

lenders.name: Joost

lenders.name: Tom

lenders.name: Nancy de Vries Falken
lenders.loan_because:
I like to do something back to the community, I am a mother of 3 children and there was a time I had to provide and take care of them alone, I was a single mom and I know how hard that can be, everybody disserves a change to grow.
And I really believe the more you give the more you receive back
lenders.occupational_info:
I just started my own new challenge, a new company, with a new special product, I am currently working very hard with a team, it's a great new experience.
I was working  for a young, dynamic company since 2002 they are active in 48 countries. I was the Sales director for EMEA and member of the board of directors. Therefore responsible for a big part of the turnover of the company which is a big challenge. 
I travel a lot, see many countries meet a lot of people and enjoy every experience of it. 
It’s a diverse job with lots of possibilities.

lenders.name: Jean

lenders.name: Stephanie

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of a hand up instead of a hand out. I know that given a chance, people can do amazing things with a little bit of support. I'd like to try to help provide support to others who are less fortunate than I am.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because:
I loan without profit to follow Christ in generosity.

I earn money on Prosper.com, and I will be putting 10% of the profit into Kiva.  Kiva is a superior donation for the developing world over subsidies or bulk food donations because these other methods often harm the target economy.  Kiva solves this problem by providing capital where there is not enough to recipients who have incentive to profit.

lenders.name: Leatitia
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to contribute in financial independency and some degree of well being of others and I hope soon to do more.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: it honors all who have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Computerized record keeping.

lenders.name: joffrey

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student

lenders.occupational_info: I do house chores, clean, do laundry, ironing, vaccuming, etc., go out to bring and  pick-up   my kids to and from school.

lenders.name: Camryn
lenders.loan_because: When I was starting out, I remember so many small favors that I received from people.  Those favors added up and ultimately got me where I am today. Their support and generosity helped me follow my dreams and become a successful business woman. It gives me such great satisfaction to do the same for people all over the world.  I love that I am actually able to sit at home with my son and see the faces and read the stories of the people we help, cheering them on every step of the way and sharing in their success.  My parents taught me the importance of giving back to the world, and Kiva is a wonderful way to pass that lesson along to my son.
lenders.occupational_info: I guess I would describe what I do as storytelling.  My hope is that through my work as an actress, I can unite people by holding a mirror up to humanity.  There are thousands of ways to make a social contribution in this world.  As an artist, I strive to illuminate the struggles, the triumphs and the sorrows of the world in hopes of provoking people to make positive changes.
